div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos euisdem
vltimo die maij anno ut supra

The quhilk day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jhone Colisone
forspekar that al the malt that was ladyne in the schip callit Ni
choles' of Abirdene salbe partit and diuidit amang the merchandis of
the samyn hud hudlik

The samyne day it was fundin' ande deliuerit be the aldirman and the consale
vndir writin that is to say Alexander menyeis Robert blinsel Dauid menyeis
yongar Jhone of Knollis Jhone Colisone thomas prat Dauid matheson
Dauid symsone William Kintor thome of mar' William tulidef Alexander
nachty William futhes Robert crage Williame andirsone Jhone Wormet
Dauid menyeis eldar Androu culan Androw Wentone Jhone moir' gilbert
moresone and Alexander gray that the gudis and merchandis' brocht hayme
now be patrik hill salbe put and deliuerit in the handis of thomas prat
and Dauid mathesone in kepin' for viij dais quhil Androw branche be
payt and content of the gudis Recouerit apone the said patrik hill efter the tenor'
of the akis maid tharapone obefor And ale the gudis that ar the said patrikis
avne propir gudis brocht hayme at this tyme salbe deliuerit to the said
Androw branche in safar as thai ar of vaile in pament of the gudis
recouerit apone the said patrik as said is within aucht dais eftir foulouing'

The said day the aldirman and Consal forsaide with avis' of the Curat and
Collectour' and part of the Communite and vthiris chaplannis for vphaldin
ande augmentacione of divyne seruice in the queyr' of Abirdene
has gevin ande grauntit to Richert boile thar ald seruitor' the haile
clerkschipis of the gallougat ande gastraw of the said burghe' witht al
fredomes Comoditeis asiamentis profitis and deviteis aucht and wont pertening or
may pertene tharto with thar pertinence for al the dais of his lywe the saide
Richert doing' continuale gude seruice in the saide queir' at al his
possibilite and pouer' as efferis to the quhilk he is oblist be the faith of his
bodie

the samyn day the aldirman and Consaile forsaid with avis' of the Curat and
Collectour and part of the Communite and vthiris chaplannis for vphaldin and
augmentacione of dyvine seruice in the queir' of Abirdene has gevin
and gravntit to Androw Coupar the haile clerkschip of the castalgate
of the said burghe' with al fredomes comoditeis asiamentis profitis and deviteis aucht
and wont pertening or may pertene tharto with the pertinence Induring' the
tovnis' will for his continuale gude seruice in the said queir' at al his

possibilite ande pouer to be done as efferis to the quhilk the saide Androw
is bundyne be the fatht of his body and to reman and nocht remoyf fra tham
but thar licence And for his remaning Williame coupar his fadir
is becumyne souerte be his hande And eftiruart the tone to Amend' and
ek him of his fee quhen he cumis tile age efter his gude seruice

the samyne day the aldirman and Consale forsaide with avis' of the Curat
ande Collectour ande part of the Communite ande vthiris chaplannis for the
vphaldin ande augmentacione of dyvine seruice in the queir' of Abirdene
has gevin ande grauntit to Sandy vocat the prayour' bell witht
ale fredomes comoditeis asiamentis profitis ande deviteis aucht and
wont the said Alexander Ryngand the said bel daly at the houris
of tuelf at novne and sex at evyne as vs' is for al cristyne
saulis ande doing' seruice in the queir' at his gudly possibilite

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos secundo die Junij anno Domini
et cetera lxxxviijo

the quhilk day It was fundyne and deliuerit be ane
assis' Androw branche forspekar that thome of Culane sal pay
to Will moir xliij s' and iiij d' for ane hous' maile aucht to
him

the samyne day It was deliuerit be ane assis' Androw branche forspekar
that Androw ramsay maltmane sal content and pay to thome menyeis
aucht markis of the Rest of xviij bollis malt acht to the said thomas
the said thomas payand' him for the making' of the said xviij bollis
of malt quhilk some the balye chargit the said Androw to pay within terme
of law

head.add: constitucio Roberti blinsel et Dauid menyeis ad recipiendum amerciamenta forestallatorum

div.p:
Eodem die prepositus fecit constituit et ordinauit Robertum blinsele et Dauid menyes suos substi
tutos ad sedendum cum ballivis in accusacione forestallatorum ad recipiendum
amerciamenta eorundem et dimidium Roberto huchonsone adhibere at aliud dimidium disponendum
pro prepositum et burgum

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos xiii die
Junij Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo octauo

the quhilk day Alexander
chavmer of murchil oblist him to freith' releyf and keip the aldirman and
balyeis of the said burghe' of this instant yer' skathtles anent
thretty nyne markis of vsual money of Scotlande aucht to the

erle of craufurde and the covntas' of craufurde of this instant' yer' of the
mertymes ande Witsonday termes last bigan of the wattir malis the
quhilkis he allegis he has pait to the saidis erle and covntas'

the samyne day the aldirman and balyeis assignit to the said Alexander
chamer of murchill thre pundis and te xl d' of Dauid mathesonnis
wattir maile of this instant yer that restit avand him of the xxxix
markis pait to the erle of craufurde and the covntas' of crafurde

The saide day Androw branche In presens of the aldirman and balyeis
denyit the wranguis' castyndone of thome pratis hous' and schew he
wald not put his fee nor heritage to ane assis' nor yet na thing'
pertening to thome quhit and forthir tuk Instrument tharapone

The samyne day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Williame
Dauisone forspekar' that the borghe' strekit be Dauid galichtly
apone Alexander of chavmer for the wranguis' withhalding' fra him of ane
yong oxe is of nane availe

The samyne day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Alexander of
chavmer forspekar that the masonis' being' at Androu branchis werk
with vthir suorne personis salbe suorne and mak vp Androu branchis
baknall that he bocht fra thome quhit quhile it be als' heth as
thome pratis gavile siclikuis' as it was obefor and to big apone it
hear and it ples' him with the perell And atour thai fand the said Androw
possessour of the taile of the said lande and gif it ples' him to big
tharapone with the perell

the samyne day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Alexander
chavmer forspekar that Williame gareache is quyt of Dauid menyes
challance of the multer except' the multer that he of the corne that he
dryit within the tone' quhilk salbe reservit to the said Williamis aith'
And' tharefter the said Williame sueir he dryit nay corne this yer
in the tone And' atour thai ordanit him to pay the multer of al his
avne corne as nichtbuir and uthiris payis

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' William Dauisone forspekar
that Alexander chavmer and ane with him in his hande sal depone the gret aith'
quhat skaith he sustenit throu Dauid galichtleis young oxe quhilk the
saide Dauid sale pay to the saide Alexander and xxx d' of siluer for the symmering'
ande wintering of the said oxe tua yeris . quhilkis being' pait the said Alexander
sal deliuer the saide oxe to the said Dauid

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxiijo die Junij anno Domini et cetera lxx
xviijo

the quhilk day it was fundyne ande deliuerit be ane assis' James
of leslie forspekar that gif Dauid mathesone previs with ony tua barnis of
his schipe that William Wormet consentit to the selling of his schip or gran
tit to byde with him in this schipe for the samyn hier' thane he ande murthow
glenmaluyn ar quyt of x s' g' follouit be the said William Ande falyeinge
tharof Dauid mathesone sal pay to the said William tene s' g'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxv die Junij
anno quo supra

quo die Dauid mathesone dixit et asseruit se debentem
annuatim capellano altaris beate marie virginis vnum annuum Redditum xij d'
monete scocie pro quadam pecia terre vaste ante portam suam Jacentem quam
quidem annuum redditum dictus Dauid obligauit se annuatim soluere dicto capellano
magistro Alexandro fyf et suis successoribus quia eandem peciam terre occupat

Eodem die prepositus et balliuj assignarunt Willelmo blinsel feriam
quintam proxime sequentem videlicet xxvij diem Junij instantis ad distringendum
terram Willelmi moir pro quodam annuo Redditu sibi de eadem debito ut
asseruit quia dictus Willelmus moir dixit se namos Inde recipiendos
de manibus prefati Willelmi cum periculo Juris recipere et Inde assisam
de prouidioribus burgi premunire

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxvij die Junij
anno ut supra

the quhilk day the balyeis assignit monunday at nexte
cumis to thome chamer litstar adas day of peremptour to ansuer' to Alexander
rede and thome prat procuratoris of Copin Andres' for the haldyne of
ix pundis for ane pip of wade

the samyn day Jhone Wormet grantit him to pay to Jhone Westlande sa
mekile siluer as thome of mar byddis him pay

Eodem die balliuj assignarunt Johanni stewinsone hodie ad quindenam
ad probandum xxiij s' solut' elene modane de edinburgo quo deficien'
eandem summam persoluere preposito nomine procuratorio dicte elene

The samyne day Jhone Sthevinsone follouit Williame blinsele for
sevin li' of Siluer be virteu of ane ak maide obefor quhilk action
was putt tile the decisione of ane assis' suorne tharto quhilkis riply
avisit deliuerit ande fande the said ak falyeit in the said Jhone' stevinsonis'
defalt becaus' he pait nocht to the said William the xl s' contenit in the said ak
And the saide Jhone has alsmekile priuilege to follow the saide William
for the said clame as he had befor the making' of the saide akez

The samyn day the balyeis assignit to murthow glenmaluyn with his avne
consent to morne the xxviij day of June instant to ansuer' to Will
Wormet and til ane borghe' strekit be Robert blinsell his forspekar
for the wranguis' withhaldyne fra him of tene s' g' as lent siluer
hamvart

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos vltimo die Junij anno
ut supra

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' that murthow
glenmaluyn sal pay or ger William Wormet be pait of xx s' scottis
for x s' g' optenit obefor quhilk the balye chargit the saide murthow
to pay within terme of law

Eodem die actio mota per Alexandrum rede et thomam prat contra thomam chamer et
Dauid Kintor procuratorio nomine Copin Andres' cum consensu vtriusque partis sub
spe concordie continuatur usque ut hodie ad octo in forma et effectu ut presens
absque preiudicio partis ad quem diem dicti Alexander thomas et Dauid fide
media se obligarunt comparere

Eodem die decretum et diliberatum fuit per assisam per os Roberti
blinsele prelocutorum assise quod Willekin est quitus de clameo vnius'
barrelle salmonum clamate per Johannem Watsone

The samyn day the bailye assignit to the spous' of Alexander
traile this day xv dais to ansuer tile ane borghe strekit apon
hir be gilbert of gareache for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him
of xxxiiij flemis elne of brad clath as day of peremptour

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem sexto die
Julij anno ut supra

The quhilk day In presens of Williame of Kyntor and William blinsele
tua balyeis of the samyn burghe' Alexander findlaw grantit him avand'
to thome gardinar ane barrele of Salmonde quhilk the said balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law to the pament of quhilk he
oblist him be the fatht of his body befor thome of mar Dauid mar'
ande Jhone of Kintor

the samyn day thome of chwmer litstar grantit him to relef and freth'
Dauid Kintor of the some of ix li' clamit be copin Andres' procuratoris
Ande morice byssat at commavnd of the balye chargit the said Thomas
to Remane within the tolbutht quhile he frede the saide Dauid tharanent

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem decimo
die Julij Anno Domini et cetera lxxxviijo

add.foreign: Caucio pro Alexandro rede W leith' facta

div.p:
the quhilk day In presens
of the aldirman ande balyeis Williame of Dunbrek come
souerte be his hande to freith' releyf ande keipe Williame of
leith' skathtles of samekile ayrschip of gudis as he deliueris
to Alexander rede In the name of Anny vmfray ane of the ayris
of gilbert lethe quhome god assoilye extending to the ferdpart of the
saide gilbertis ayrschipe pertening to the said Anny

The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' master androw cadiow
forspekar that Androw branche sal pay to patrik hile thre quarteris of the fraucht
of j barrel that the stuff come in that he resavit fra the said patrik And als' the
said Androw sal pay iiijor g' of Ilkan li' g' that he hed of the said Androwis
in waring to his fee becaus' the said patrik has maid fatht that he deliuerit
to him his haile rekning of his gudis And as for the hattis baggis y and
pantuelis that the said Androw clamit / the said patrik is quyte
becaus' it is fundin' that the saide Androw has resauit vthir stuff in
payment tharfor

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xiiij die Julij
anno Domini et cetera lxxxviijo

the samyn day the balyeis be ward of the
court assignit this day xv dais as day of peremptor' to morice
byssat to ansuer tile ane borghe' strekit apone him be Alexander sanchar' for
the wranguis withhaldin fra him of xviij s g'

Eodem die Alexander traile protestatus fuit quod non Incederet in aliquo placito
cum gilberto gareache penes xxxiij vlnas flemis panni lati et cetera

the samyn day it was fundin' and deliuerit be ane assis' that Wat auchnewe
sal pay to mastir Androw cadiow xl s' or ellis lavne wortht xl s'

the saide day the borghe' strekit be gilbert of gareache apone the wif of
Alexander traile is continevit but preiudice tile ony party quhil friday that next
cumis in siclik strentht force and effect as it has now becaus' it was
allegit that the saide actione' sulde pertene to the spirituale Jurisdiction'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem
anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo octauo xxio die Julij

The samyne day Dauid houysone grantit opinly that he had nay
commavnd nor charge nother in word nor writ of Robert blinsel nor
Jhone Wormet to bynd nor oblis' thame in beruik nor yet to mak
ony Indenturis or contrakis In thar name thar nor in nane vthir
placis of merchandice gold siluer nor nane vthir gudis of the quhilkis
the saide Robert and Jhone askit certificacione vndir the Secret Sele

the samyne day Dauid houysone was accusit and follouit be Robert
blinsele ande Jhone Wormet befor the aldirman ande balyeis for
the making' of writis and contrakis in thar namez in beruik quhilkis
was put tile ane assis' quhilk Riply avisit deliuerit and fand be
the moutht of Alexander chamer forspekar that Dauid houyson wrangit in
the making' of the contrakis and writis with Jhone Retistar inglisman and with
ale vthiris personis In thar names And' atour the said Dauid sal fynd
souerte to keipe the saidis Robert and Jhone skathtles of al bandis and writis
that he has maid in thar namez Ande the said Dauid sal nocht Intromett
with the gudis that is now cumyne within this havyne in Jhone' fechatis
kerueile quhile he fynd the said Souerte And' thareftir James of
Kintor come souerte be his hand landis and gudis to the bailye to kepe
the saidis Robert ande Jhone Wormet skathtles of al writis contrakis
ande Indenturis maide tile ony personis In thar namys

The samyne day the ballieis assignit Wednisday that next cumis to Jhon'
grige tile ansuer tile ane borghe' strekit apone him be mastir Androw
cadiow forspekar for Wile yonge quhit for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him
of tua serplar of gudis that was in the hulk that cost him xlviij li' scottis
ande the waring' tharof in merchandice the space of fiwe yer bigan extending
in the haile to jc li' the quhilkis he sauld to him for xl markis and resavit
ande yet has his erlis tharapone as day of peremptor' according' to the
law for ane farande man dusty futyt

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxiijo die Julij
anno quo supra

The quhilk day the borghe' strekit be mastir Androw
Cadiow forspekar for Wile yonge quhit apone Jhone grige is continevit
for waknes of the court quhil settirday that next cumis in silik strintht
as it is now to the quhilk borghe' the said Jhone grig is warnit
be morice byssat officiare

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem the xxviij
die Julij Anno ut supra

the quhilk day morice byssat oblist
him be the fatht of his body lelely and truly to pay to Alexander
sanchar fourty s' vsual money of Scotland for xviii s' g' at thir
termes eftir foulouing that is to say j mark at yule next hereftir / j
mark at the Witsonday next thareftir And j mark at lammes next
thareftir but langar delay fraud or gile

the samyn day Jhone sanclar' producit In jugement j chartir quhilk
eftir follouis Omnibus hanc cartam visuris vuel Audituris Alexander skeyne
de eodem eternam in domino salutem noueritis me vtilitate mea in hac parte videlicet
et diligenter considerata dedisse concessisse et precise vendidisse tituloque pure
vendicionis alienasse et hac presenti carta mea conifrmasse honesto viro Johanni
sanclar' burgense burgi de Abirdene vnum annuum redditum sex s' vsualis monete
scocie annuatim leuand' de terra ipsius Johannis Jacente et existen' in vico furcarum
ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram Roberti quhit ex australi ex vna et terram Alexandri
sanchar ex boreali partibus ex altera communes vias regias versus oriens et
occidens michi Jure hereditario contingen' pro quadam certa summa pecunie quam
dictus Johannes michi tempore confectionis presentis carte mee in pecunua pecunia numerata bene et fideliter
persoluebat ad redempcione debitorum meorum de quaquidem summe peccunua pecunia teneo me bene
content' at plenarie persolut' ac eundem Johannem heredes suos executores et assignatos pro me heredibus
meis executoribus et assignatis exinde quieteclamo imperpetuum Tenend' et habend' totum et integrum
annuum redditum sex s' antedictum cum suis pertinenciis prefato Johanni heredibus suis et suis assignatis
a me heredibus meis et assignatis in feodo et hereditate Imperpetuum ac capiend' et leuand' de
predicta terra annuatim ad duos annj terminos vsuales penticosten videlicet et Sancti
martini in yeme per equales porciones cum omnibus et singulis libertatibus comoditatibus
et asiamentis ac iustis suis pertinenciis quibuscumque ad predictum annuum redditum spectan' seu iuste
spectare valen' quomodolibet in futurum Adeo libere plenarie integre honorifice bene et in pace
in omnibus et per omnia sicut aliquis annuus Redditus infra dictum burgum aut extra venditur
datur aut possidetur sine Reuocacione aut contradictione aliquali Et ego vero predictus Alexander
heredes mei et assignatos totum et integrum annuum redditum sex s' prenominat' cum suis
procuratoribus prefato Johanni heredibus suis et suis assignatis in omnibus et per omnia ut premissum
est per omnes terras et possessiones nostras warantizabimus acquietabimus et contra
omnes mortales fideliter defendemus In cuius Rei testimonium Sigillum meum et sigillum prouidi
viri Johannis stewinsone vnius balliuorum dicti burgi ac datorum sasine dictus annuus
redditus huic presenti carte mee sunt appensa Apud Abirdene xio die mensis septembris
Anno Domini Mo ccccmo octuagesimo sexto coram prouidis viris thoma fyff thoma mar' Roberto
quhit barbetonsore Andrea fyf Alexandro haw burgensibus dicti burgi philippo Dunbrek
vno seriandorum et domino Johanne stirueling' presbytero ac Notario publico cum diuersis Aliis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio quarto die Augusti anno quo supra

The quhilk day William blinsell ane of the balyeis of the said burghe' In
presens of the aldirman and diuers' of the consaile opinly schew and declarit that he hed
beyne sindry tymes at Jhone Wormet Conny menyeis Dauid Kintor Dauid
lousone Alexander scrogis gilbert moresone Androu ancroft and William mar and askit
thar wattir malis that thar war avand' of this yer that he mycht rede the lordis
pensionis' and mak ane his compt at the chaker as efferis to keip the tovne
out of danger tharanent And als' he hed' bene at the said personis and chargit
tham to tak thar nethis out of the wattir and decist fra the fisching' of the samyn
in the kingis name and in the aldirman and balyeis quhil thai red thar male And' atour
he gert the belman pas' throw the towne and charge al personis avand thar wattir mal'
cum to the tolbutht and bringe thar malez with tham to the ridschip of the towne Ne
uirless as yet he coud' nocht be pait of the said personis Quharfor he prostestit sole
mptly that gif ony costis skathis or danger suld cum apone the towne tharthrow
the forsaid personis suld Incur the samyn sene he was redy and coud' not get thar malis

the samyn day Alexander tailyour in futy grantit him borghe' and dettour to Adam Knollis
for ane barrele of Salmonde for huchone of Wellis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos octauo die Augusti
anno ut supra

the quhilk day the aldirman and balyeis assignit settirday that
next cumis to thome Narne to cum and ane sufficiant persone with him in his hand
to depone anent the scheip that he clamys is his haldin be Jhone Watsone
and his sone And gif he and ane sufficiant persone deponis be thar aithis that the said
scheipe is his he optenis him And gif he falyeis in his deposition the saidis
Jhone and his sone ar quyt of his clayme
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xi die Augusti anno ut supra

the samyn day James of Kintor grantit him avand thre barrellis of sal
monde to Wat of auchneyff be ane ak maide tharapone obefor quhilkis
thomas Jamesone seriande at commavnd of the ballieis chargit the said James
pay with his wande within terme of law

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Walterus atkyn'sone est legit
timus et propinquior heres quondam Andree atkyne patris suj

Eodem die Willelmus belty creauit et constituit Robertum blinsel suum procuratorem et
assignatum ad petendum et recipiendum vnam barrellam salmonum a Jacobo
Kyntor et inde quieteclamand' Promittens de Rato et grato cum suis omnibus
clausulis necessariis et oportunis in vberiore forma procuratorij

the samyn day James of Kintor grantit him avand' ane hambir barrele of Sal
mond' to Robert blinsele for Wille belty quhilk he oblist him be the fatht
of his bodie lelely and treuly to pay at the next mydsomir' efter foulouing' befor
the aldirman and balyeis

the samyn day the aldirman ande balyeis assignit settirday cum xv dais
to thome Watsone sone to Jhone Watsone to comper befor thaim and depone
the aith' as the assis' deliuerit and ordanit in the actione debatabile betuix'
the saide Jhone Watsone and Thome Narne anent the scheipe clamyt be
the said thomas narne And' atour thai ordanit thome Jamesone officiar to
warne thome Narne to comper the said day befor thaim to her' the said de
posicione

add.foreign: decretum inter D menyes et t hobson'

div.p:
At Abirdene the xii day of August the yer of god jM iiijC auchty and aucht yeris
we sere Jhone Ruthirfurd aldirman Robert blinsele James leslie Alexander red thomas
prat Jhone Wormet Thome of mar Androu Culane and Richerd hile arbitoris
and amicabile componitouris chosin betuix Dauid menyeis eldar burges of Abirdene one that ane
part And Thomas hobsone merchande of beruik one that vthir part to determe and decide
the debatis controuersiis and clamys dependand betuix the said partiis debatibile eftir the
tenor of ane Indentur maid betuix tham we being' suorne the gret bodely aitht to
deliuer eftir our knaulage And thai oblist be the fathtis of thar bodies to stand at
our deliuerance We Riply avisit havande god and gud conscience befor and the Richtis
and resonnis of batht the said partiis herd seyne ande vndirstandin deliueris ande
ordanis that the said Dauid menyeis sale mak ful pament of the salmond to the said
thomas hobsone eftir the tenour of his Indentur And the said thomas hobsone sal sett
sufficient souerte that quhat tyme the sad Dauid bringis certificacione or sufficient preif
that the common' mesour of beruyk is mair than the mesour that he has resavit the malt and
quhet with fra the said thomas in Abirdene to pay the excrescence and ourcome that is betuix'
the saidis mesouris to the said Dauid And' atour gif it ples' the said Dauid to deliuer to the
saide thomas malt extending to iiijor li' of Salmond he salbe dischargit of the samyn
iiij li' salmond And gif he wile nocht he sal mak him haile pament of al the haile sal
mond in continent eftir the tenor of his Indentur

Decimo quarto die Augusti Anno Domini et cetera lxxxviijo In dominus In presencia prepositi et Willelmi
blinsel vnius balliuorum thomas hobsone anglicus mercator de beruik constituit
fecit creauit et nominauit Jacobum leslie et Alexandrum Rede coniunctim et diuisim suo procuratores
legitimos ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Dauid menyeis et Jacobo Kyntor
salmones et alia debita sibi quecumque et cetera et de receptis acquitancias Dauid' Et
si notere fuerit ipsos prosequend' coram quocumque Judice competen' promittens de Rato et
grato cum omnibus clausulis necessariis et oportunis et in vberiore forma procuratorij
testibus Alexandro de camera de murchile Roberto blinsell Dauid menyeis Junioris Jacobo
strachin' Walterus craufurde
